::Battera::

Beautiful? That word sent her mind spinning. How this bot could think 
of as beautiful was beyond her. She always thought of herself as just 
a plain bat and nothing more.
"Yes please. It would be nice to eat here. I'll enjoy being out of my 
room for a little while."
She tilted her head down and smiled. Then she looked up at him. 
"Thank you for the offer of the tour. But won't your commander get 
made for showing me the ship? After all, aren't I still just a pred? 
I don't want to get you in trouble."
The food dispencer showed it was finishes and se took her bowl of 
fruit to a table and sat down. 
"Would you like a peice?" as she offers him the bowl.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm smiles at Battera. "No problem, beautiful. You're great 
company."
> 
> He looks around the mess hall. "Would you like to eat here instead 
of your 
> room? I could give you a tour of the ship afterwards."
